project_descr: Transforming the market for efficient lighting in Russia

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is to reduce greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions in the Russian Federation by improving energy efficiency in the lighting sector. The project targets the transformation of the lighting market in Russia through the promotion of energy efficient lighting technologies and systems, and phasing-out inefficient lighting. This is envisaged to be achieved by (1) improving the national legal and regulatory environment and institutional capacities to facilitate the introduction and wide-spread application of comprehensive energy efficient lighting norms and standards; (2) supporting man

document_name: Terminal Evaluation of UNDP/GEF Project: TRAnsforming the Market for Efficient Lighting
